// // src/api/index.js

const crawWurm = {
  artist: "Richard Sardinha",
  cmc: 6,
  colorIdentity: ["G"],
  colors: ["Green"],
  flavor:

  id: "ada04e68-5bec-59bf-8474-7e87e82da1e8",
  imageUrl:
    "http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=130527&type=card",

  name: "Craw Wurm",

// export async function fetchCards(terms) {
//   return [crawWurm, demolish];

//--------------------------------------------------Version 2---------------------------------------------

import axios from "axios";

export async function fetchCards({ name, text }) {
  try {
    const { data } = await axios.get(
      `https://api.magicthegathering.io/v1/cards?name=${name}&text=${text}`
    );

    return data.cards || [];
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
}
